title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY: True Crimes That Inspired Freak Show
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: pepper's backstory is the only thing that has made me cry so far
This is the most underrated season ever

Twisty: *wears a prosthetic smile*
Joker: hello beautiful
Gacy didn't make a living off of being a clown at birthday parties. It was just something he did a few times a month. He owned a business and used the victims as possible "workers"
description:
Here are the true stories that inspired major plot points in AHS Freak Show, including Twisty the Clown, Jimmy Darling, and Dot & Bette Tattler.

In this video, Greg breaks down how AHS Season 4's most iconic characters were inspired by real-life figures and horrific crime stories.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
